alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:12PM CST until December 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow, Difficult Travel Tonight... .A wintry mix continues in north-central Wisconsin will persist late this afternoon where some roads remain slick. Tonight, precipitation will transition to snow with a several hour period of high snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour expected, especially near and north of the Interstate 94 corridor. Lower amounts are expected farther west near the Mississippi River. Be prepared for deteriorating travel conditions overnight, especially if traveling across central into north-central Wisconsin. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe; Trempealeau
